name: A Short Walk in the Woods
name_original: A Short Walk in the Woods
description:
On July 2nd of 2022 I ended up in the hospital with severe dehydration, and heat stroke. My recovery has been pretty slow going since then. So I can't go for walks in the woods anymore at this time because the sun makes me very sick.

The creation of "A Short Walk in the Woods" was a way for me to share how important interacting with the natural world is to me.

To play use the arrow keys to move around. On a touch screen device simply flick the screen in the direction you would like to go.
